    "dependency_rule": "Presentation → Domain ← Data, Infrastructure → Domain. Domain has NO external dependencies.",

    "naming": "UpperCamelCase for types, lowerCamelCase for variables/functions, Protocol suffix for protocols"

  "constraints": [

    "iOS 17.0+ minimum deployment target",
